name: Firekeeper (Thomas Olsson, JarMustard)
description:
Keep the flames alive and hold the shadows at bay. 

---

Controls: 

  • WASD + ARROWS
  • Move - SPACE
  • Attack - CTRL
  • Fireball (eventually)
  • F11 - Fullscreen
  • ALT + F4 - Quit
  • Controller supported.

---

Hints:

  • Feed the fire with sticks until it roars.
  • Find the crystals to make you and the fire stronger.
  • The super fireball takes time to recharge.
  • Ignite the trees for extra protection.
  • Make the fire big enough to burn away the darkness!

---

Made for LD JAM 46 by Thomas Olsson and Justin Ma

Ludum dare page
